mapper.select: SELECT hq.host_qna_no, hq.host_no, h.host_name, hq.host_qna_category, hq.host_qna_state, hq.host_qna_title, hq.host_qna_content, hq.host_qna_upload_file, hq.create_date, hq.update_date, hqc.admin_no, a.admin_name, hqc.host_qna_comment_content, hqc.comment_date FROM host_qna hq LEFT JOIN host_qna_comment hqc ON hq.host_qna_no = hqc.host_qna_no LEFT JOIN host h ON hq.host_no = h.host_no LEFT JOIN admin a ON hqc.admin_no = a.admin_no WHERE hq.host_qna_no = #{hostQnaNo}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO host_qna( host_no, host_qna_category, host_qna_title, host_qna_content, host_qna_upload_file, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{hostNo}, #{hostQnaCategory}, #{hostQnaTitle}, #{hostQnaContent}, #{hostQnaUploadFile}, NOW(), NOW() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO host_qna_comment( host_qna_no, admin_no, host_qna_comment_content, comment_date ) VALUES ( #{hostQnaNo}, #{adminNo}, #{hostQnaCommentContent}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE host_qna SET host_qna_title = #{hostQnaTitle}, host_qna_content = #{hostQnaContent}, host_qna_upload_file = #{hostQnaUploadFile}, update_date = NOW() WHERE host_qna_no = #{hostQnaNo} AND host_no = #{hostNo}
